$mdDialog service (angular material docs) 
var alertModal = wixMdDialogBuilder.alert();
      alertModal.title('Set Up Payments');
      alertModal.iconUrl('images/modal-v-icon.png');
      alertModal.content('You havent set up any payment methods for your customers. Choose how you want to get paid in your Store Manager.');
      alertModal.confirm('Exit Page');
      alertModal.cancel('Close');
      $mdDialog.show(alertModal).then(function () {
        console.log('resolve');
        $scope.message = 'resolve';
      }).catch(function () {
        console.log('catch');
        $scope.message = 'catch';
      });
 
var alertModal = wixMdDialogBuilder.alert();
      alertModal.title('Set Up Payments');
      alertModal.iconUrl('images/modal-v-icon.png');
      alertModal.content('You havent set up any payment methods for your customers. Choose how you want to get paid in your Store Manager.');
      alertModal.confirm('Exit Page');
      alertModal.cancel('Close');
      alertModal.style('DANGER');
      $mdDialog.show(alertModal).then(function () {
        console.log('resolve');
        $scope.message = 'resolve';
      }).catch(function () {
        console.log('catch');
        $scope.message = 'catch';
      });
 
var premiumModal = wixMdDialogBuilder.premium();
      premiumModal.title('Set Up Payments');
      premiumModal.subtitle('I am sub');
      premiumModal.iconUrl('images/modal-v-icon.png');
      premiumModal.content('You havent set up any payment methods for your customers. Choose how you want to get paid in your Store Manager.');
      premiumModal.confirm('Get My FREE Month', 'wix-button-premium');
      premiumModal.cancel('Next Time', 'wix-button-premium is-button-outline');
        $mdDialog.show(premiumModal).then(function () {
        console.log('resolve');
        $scope.message = 'resolve';
      }).catch(function () {
        console.log('catch');
        $scope.message = 'catch';
      });

$mdToast service (angular material docs)

  • Icon should be provided in max size 32px * 32px
  • Not all combinations of features are allowed in design (eg. Icon and Action on the same toast). Get design details from your favourite UX person
  • 'Warning' toast does not support all features (notice the console errors)
This is some content inside the md-toast-parent, You can active 'withParent' checkbox to see how it looks. you can also activate the following checkboxes to see how a full width will look like: 'hideDelay' with '0' value, showCloseButton, showFullWidth, withParent. Then click on 'open general' button to see how it works nicely. It will add padding to the container, we found out that this is the most common use-case. 
var obj = wixMdToastBuilder.general()
          .content('this is a message')
          .autoHide(1000)
          .showLightColored()
          .showCloseButton()
          .showFullWidth();
 
var obj = wixMdToastBuilder.general()
          .content('this is a message')
          .showIcon({
            isDark: true,
            cssClass: 'someClass',
            url: 'images/toast/ic-default.png'
          })
 
.
          var el = angular.element($document[0].getElementById('mdToastParentId'));
          var obj = wixMdToastBuilder.general()
            .content('this is a message')
            .withParent(el);
 
var obj = wixMdToastBuilder.general()
          .content('this is a message')
          .showAction({
            type: wixMdToastBuilder.actionTypes.link,
            text: 'Undo',
            url: 'http://www.wix.com',
            targetType: wixMdToastBuilder.targetTypes.blank
          })
 
var obj = wixMdToastBuilder.general()
          .content('this is a message')
          .showAction({
            type: wixMdToastBuilder.actionTypes.button,
            text: 'click',
            onClick: function () { alert('walla'); },
          })
 You can also add the following configuration in the .config phase: 
.config(function (wixMdToastBuilderProvider) {
            wixMdToastBuilderProvider.setParent(parentElement);
          })

md-layout directives (angular material docs)

in order to use (md) layout classes with wix-style customizations wrap eveything with wix-layout class

layout-padding - attribute used to padd a container with half the size of our configured grid-gutter-width(36px)

*checkout examples for better understanding of how to use this attribute

grid-gutter-width - is the width of space we keep between our blocks, we use 36px for our gutter width.

content block, size-{{block}}
